BoredByeTopicclass

actor.t[3416]

Summary

Details

Details

A "bored" goodbye topic. This handles ONLY goodbyes that happen when the actor we're talking terminates the conversation out of boredom (i.e., after a period of inactivity in the conversation). Note that this is a subset of ImpByeTopic - ImpByeTopic handles "bored" and "leaving" goodbyes, while this one handles only the "bored" goodbyes. You can use this kind of topic if you want to differentiate the responses to "bored" and "leaving" conversation endings. `class `**`BoredByeTopic`**` :   `[`MiscTopic`](../object/MiscTopic.html)
